document.full_text: lou williams hit a 3-pointer with 8.1 seconds left to lead the 76ers to a comeback win over the heat on sunday and avoid a sweep.
document.title: 76ers 86, heat 82: 76ers rally to beat heat in game 4
lines_and_colors: lou williams hit a 3-pointer with 8.1 seconds left to lead the 76ers to a comeback win over the heat on sunday and avoid a sweep.
